properties.areaDesc: Union, KY; Gallatin, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:50PM CST until January 20 at 11:08PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Illinois...Kentucky...Indiana...

Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam...Shawneetown

.Heavy rainfall along the Ohio and Wabash Rivers will cause water
levels to rise to minor flood stage mid week. The J.T. Myers Dam
and Shawneetown river points are forecast to crest on Saturday
and then fall below flood stage early next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Shawneetown.
* from this evening to Monday January 20.
* At  7:30 PM Monday the stage was 33.0 feet.
* Flood Stage is 33.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to
rise to near 35.9 feet by Saturday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by Monday afternoon, January 20th.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
